subject: Football (College)
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: Behind by 13, the Wildcats rallied to beat Nevada, 49-48, with two Matt Scott scoring passes and an onside kick recovery in the last 46 seconds of the New Mexico Bowl.
snippet: Behind by 13, the Wildcats rallied to beat Nevada, 49-48, with two Matt Scott scoring passes and an onside kick recovery in the last 46 seconds of the New Mexico Bowl.
